fields_of_interest: Consumers, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: Digital Agenda Strategy - Security of electronic transactions (mainly in payments, telecoms, government, healthcare).
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: European eCall Implementation Platform#E02481#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2481#Member#C#Expert Group on liability and new technologies #E03592#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3592#Member#C#Product Liability Directive formation
goals__remit:
Advocate for the use of Smart Secure Devices and smart security solutions to enhance the usability of digital services while protecting privacy and combating fraud 
  
Engage for standardization of interoperable smart security solutions and promotes European standards world-wide 
  
Represent our member companies in the formulation and implementation of EU public policy, legislation and regulation 
  
Speak on behalf of the smart security industry with European and international governmental bodies and institutions, national regulators and agencies, the media, and other organizations 
  
Monitor smart security market trends and publishes twice a year volume market forecasts by segment, being the WW reference 
  
Give our member companies access to a network of experts including academics, laboratories and associations
